ModuleAnchor.helper: Used to create #anchor-links on the page (numbers, letters, hyphens only).

Heading.helper: This is the <h1> title on the top of the page.

Images.helper: At least one image is required. If more than one is saved, a random one will be displayed on each page load.

Image.helper: Can be an on- or off-site image. Uploads go to the /Images folder.
